full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title**: W7714-238435 Multi Channel Corrosion Testing System
**Solicitation Number**: WS4422752383
**Publication Date**: February 28, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: March 21, 2024 at 2 PM EST

## Background
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking to procure a multi-channel corrosion testing system. The system should be capable of conducting a variety of corrosion test procedures to simulate, measure, and record the corrosion of various metal alloys and conductive composites in seawater.

## Request for Proposal
Canada is inviting offers from qualified suppliers to provide an electrochemical test apparatus that meets the requirements outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP). The RFP can be accessed through the SAP Ariba platform upon logging in and completing the Government of Canada profile.

## Key Requirements
The system must be capable of performing corrosion experiments on 8 separate channels and can be used to test various metal alloys and conductive composites in seawater.

## Selection Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price offered.

## Contact Information
Inquiries and requests for the RFP can be submitted to:
Genevieve Petten (SPAC/PSPC)
genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Debriefing
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. Requests should be made within 15 working days from receipt of notification that the bid was unsuccessful.

## Trade Agreements
This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). html ## Agreementes
